declaration.it-is-a-criminal-offence: It is a criminal offence to record this hearing (by audio or video), to publish any such recording, or to take any images (by photo or screenshot)
declaration.i-confirm-that-i-will-not-record-or-take: I confirm that I will not record or take any images of this hearing

equipment-check.lets-confirm-your-equipment-is-working: Let's confirm your equipment is working
equipment-check.this-short-video: This short video will help you check that your camera and microphone are working.

hearing-rules.you-must-follow-courtroom-rules: You must follow the same rules as you would in a courtroom.
hearing-rules.must-only-use-your-phone-to-contact-the-: must only use your phone for contact with the video hearings team
hearing-rules.are-not-allowed-to-smoke-including-e-cig: are not allowed to smoke (including e-cigarettes)
hearing-rules.must-be-alone-unless-you-have-the-judges: must be alone unless you have the judge’s permission to have someone with you
hearing-rules.must-ask-the-judges-permission-to-move-a: must ask the judge's permission if you need to move away from your screen

judge-hearing-list.call-the-video-hearings-team-on: Call the video hearings team on

participant-hearings.if-no-details-shown-please-contact-us: If you were expecting to see the details of a hearing here, please contact the video hearings team.

participant-self-test.when-the-video-has-ended-answer-3-questi: When the video has ended, answer 3 questions to confirm your microphone and camera are working.

switch-on-camera-microphone.switch-on-your-camera-and-microphone-to-: Switch on your camera and microphone to watch the video.

Your camera and microphone are switched on. You can now continue to the video.
switch-on-camera-microphone.your-camera-and-microphone-are-blocked: Your camera and microphone are blocked
switch-on-camera-microphone.we-are-sorry-you-can-not-take-part-witho: We're sorry, you can't take part in the hearing without using your camera and microphone.
switch-on-camera-microphone.stay-close-to-your-phone-and-we-will-cal: Stay close to your phone and we'll call you within 5 minutes.
switch-on-camera-microphone.we-are-sorry-hearing-can-not-go-ahead-if: We're sorry, the hearing can't go ahead if your camera and microphone are blocked.
switch-on-camera-microphone.please-unblock-the-camera-and-microphone: Please unblock the camera and microphone or call us if there is a problem.
